document.full_text: from the news that phil hughes would miss at least another six to eight weeks, to a second straight day of struggles for the offense, it was a rough wednesday.
document.title: tigers 4, yankees 0: yankees' rocky day continues into night
lines_and_colors: from the news that phil hughes would miss at least another six to eight weeks, to a second straight day of struggles for the offense, it was a rough wednesday.
